name: blogger
description: Students will use node, express, mongoose, controllers, services to create a server that persists data to a database. The goal of this project is to build a blog engine for Blogger, the Blog company! We want to be able to create a blog, get all blogs, get blogs by their title(slug), and get all blogs with a given tag. We also want to be able to get a blog by its id, edit a specific blog by its id or delete that blog based on its id. This project consists solely of the back-end(server) side of the application. The front end will be handled for you. However, you must write your routes to accommodate this functionality on the front-end.
